law.catch_line: Notification to Department of Charitable Gaming of investigation or prosecution of violation of charitable gaming laws.
law.text: All law enforcement agencies and investigative bodies shall notify the Department of Charitable Gaming of any investigation or prosecution of any violation of the charitable gaming laws as soon as reasonably possible after commencing the investigation or prosecution and shall coordinate any investigation with the department.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 18, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 374, sec. 1, effective July 14, 2000. -- Created 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 331, sec. 1, effective April 10, 1996.
